eu.jpereira.trainings.designpatterns.behavioral.command.model
Interface DBServerInstanceGroup

public interface DBServerInstanceGroup

This class represents a group of DB Server instances

Author:
jpereira

Method Detail

getName

java.lang.String getName()
Get the unique name of this group

Returns:
the unique name of this group

addInstance

void addInstance(DBServerInstance instance)
                 throws NotUniqueDBInstanceException
Adds an instance to the group.

Parameters:
instance - The instance to add to the group. The IPAddress of instance should be unique whitin this group
Throws:
NotUniqueDBInstanceException - if the IP Address of the instance is not unique

removeInstance

boolean removeInstance(java.lang.String ip)
Removes an instance from the groupe

Parameters:
ip - the ip of the instance to remove
Returns:
True when the instance was removed, false othwise (could be because there's no instance with that ip)

getInstance

DBServerInstance getInstance(java.lang.String ipAddress)
Finds an instance of DBServerInstance

Parameters:
ipAddress - the IP Address of DBServerInstance
Returns:
a DBServerInstance or null if there's no instance with that in in this group

startAllInstances

void startAllInstances()
                       throws CouldNotConnectException
Attempt to start all instances of this groups

Throws:
CouldNotConnectException - If any of the servers could not be reached

stopAllInstances

void stopAllInstances()
                      throws CouldNotConnectException
Attempts to stop all instances of this group

Throws:
CouldNotConnectException
